Package Misc

Class Inventory

Object
Inventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Inventory extends Object implements Serializable
Keeps track of all medications and replenishment requests
See Also:

    • dispenseMedication

      public void dispenseMedication(String medicationName, int amount) throws InsufficientResourcesException
      Subtracts amount from medication with medicationName, if the stock is high enough
      Parameters:
      medicationName - name of the medication to be dispensed
      amount - amount to be dispensed
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourcesException - when there in not enough medication in stock to dispense amount

    • refillMedication

      public void refillMedication(String medName, int amount)
      Add amount to medication with medication name
      Parameters:
      medName - medication to be refilled
      amount - amount to be added

    • addReplenishmentRequest

      public void addReplenishmentRequest(ReplenishmentRequest replenishmentRequest)
      Saved replenishment request
      Parameters:
      replenishmentRequest - request to be saved
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - requested medication does not exist

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      public void approveReplenishmentRequest(ReplenishmentRequest request)

      Parameters:
      request - request to accept
